text: "Walk Hand in Hand" is a 1956 song by Tony Martin and went to number 2 in the United Kingdom and number 10 in the United States. It was covered by Andy Williams as his debut single and went to number 54 in the United States. It was also covered by Gerry and the Pacemakers in 1965 and went to number 29 in the United Kingdom and number 10 in Canada. ==References== Category:1956 songs Category:Andy Williams songs Category:Gerry and the Pacemakers songs Category:Engelbert Humperdinck songs
title: Walk Hand in Hand
